item.title: NetScaler Insight Center 虚拟桌面和应用监控利器
item.author: liuzh66@gmail.com (刘征 Martin Liu)
item.description: NetScaler Insight Center with HDX insight and Web Insight overcomes the limitations of traditional methods and technologies to fully address the application visibility challenges facing today’s enterprises. Featuring an approach that leverages NetScaler ADCs, Insight Center combines network-based instrumentation – that is both network and application-aware – with an efficient and powerful management system capable of transforming raw data into actionable information. 在C
